title: Murphy Law in... A STORYBOARDED STAGEPLAY!
content:
[[module Rate]]

[[iframe https://www.youtube.com/embed/ToNuQs41VS4 width="1120" height="630" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen]]


> A recorded snippet of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7043 one] of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/murphy-law-hub several] Murphy Law stage adaptations. While not anomalous in and of itself, due to its connection to SCP-3143 all discovered footage like it is to be confiscated, and the location of the source is to be tracked and found.
> It is currently unknown how these scripts ended up in the hands of others, and how many are out there.
author: Dino--Draws
